title: Jeb: 正在修复Bug&准备1.11新特性
author: obby825
txt_content:
Jeb: Good Tuesday! We are working on both bug fixes and Minecraft PC 1.11 features, but these features will not be revealed until Minecon.
Jeb: 美好的周二！我们正忙于修复Bug并为Minecraft 1.11的新特性做准备，但我们在Minecon之前不会透露这些新特性。

replies.author: 我如黑日
replies.txt_content:
bug=特性
mojang又准备刷一波版本号了
{:10_495:}建议推出3D模型····该进化了吧···
